name: Crystal Lines
description:
In this game your task is to compose lines of color crystals. Drag a selected gem in a direction you want it to move. The crystal will slide while it is possible. So if you get a line of the same crystals they will disappear from the board.

Removing crystals you remove also golden tiles. Your goal is to remove all golden tiles on the board. If you success you win. Patterns of golden tiles can be different so you can replay the game again with a new tile pattern. Play and get you high score!
